The Bible is designed of God to be the book by which the understanding may be disciplined, the soul guided and directed. To live in the world and yet to be not of the world, is a problem that many professed Christians have never worked out in their practical life. Enlargement of mind will come to a nation only as men return to their allegiance to God. The world is flooded with books on general information, and men apply their minds in searching uninspired histories; 
                                                                           21
but they neglect the most wonderful Book that can give them the most correct ideas and ample understanding. 
     Review and Herald, Feb. 25, 1896.
